name: organic baby hooded towel: hemp organic cotton fleece
description:
Organic baby hooded towel. Organic baby shower gift. Eco-friendly baby bath accessories. Made of 1 layer of dye free hemp fleece. Extra large size 35" x 35" that will also benefit an older child. A perfect eco-friendly gift for a newborn sensitive skin.
Stitching color: Yellow. 
Composition: 55% hemp 45% organic cotton fleece
Care instructions: hand or machine wash warm. No chlorine bleach. No fabric softeners. Tumble dry low or air dry.

Benefits of hemp:
- Durable and Absorbent.
- Gets softer and softer with use
- Naturally Antimicrobial.

Why choose hemp? Baby's skin is 5 times more sensitive than yours and their immune system is delicate. Say NO to those nasty pesticides and insecticides lurking in most fabrics and choose organic and Hemp with CurlyMonkey. 

Shipping: All orders are made to order and ship within 3 to 5 business days via USPS Priority Mail (Domestic)

Size: 1 size (6 months to 5 years old). Color: Natural 
Closure: white resin snaps (compliant with CPSIA). Yellow stitching. (Blue bib comes with Turquoise stitching)
Measurement before washing: Neck opening: 5". Width (at widest part): 9-1/4". Front body Length: 9-1/4"
